markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Lobbed Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=1191) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Juggler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=36)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12); [Juggler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1187)

**Requirements**
You are Juggling a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon.

</column>

---

You make a thrown ranged Strike with the required weapon, using the weapon’s normal range increment. This attack doesn’t trigger reactions, and if the target has never seen you use this feat before, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against this attack.
name: Lobbed Attack
requirement: You are Juggling a  thrown  weapon.

</summary>

This attack doesn’t trigger reactions, and if the target has never seen you use this feat before, the target is flat-footed against this attack.
